Package persistence.API

Class APICharacterDAO

java.lang.Object
persistence.API.APICharacterDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterDAO
public class APICharacterDAO extends Object implements CharacterDAO
This class is to store and read character instances CharacterGame information through an API.
